```{=html}
<script>
  const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.highlight-slide');
  const prevBtn = document.querySelector('.nav-left');
  const nextBtn = document.querySelector('.nav-right');
  const dotsContainer = document.querySelector('.dots');
  let currentIndex = 0;
  let autoSlide;

  // auto-generate dots based on the number of slides
  dotsContainer.innerHTML = "";
  slides.forEach((_, i) => {
    const dot = document.createElement("div");
    dot.classList.add("dot");
    if (i === 0) dot.classList.add("active");
    dot.setAttribute("data-index", i);
    dotsContainer.appendChild(dot);
  });

  const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.dot');

  function showSlide(index) {
    slides.forEach((slide, i) => {
      slide.classList.remove('active');
      if (i === index) slide.classList.add('active');
    });
    dots.forEach(dot => dot.classList.remove('active'));
    dots[index].classList.add('active');
    currentIndex = index;
  }

  function nextSlide() {
    let nextIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % slides.length;
    showSlide(nextIndex);
  }

  function prevSlide() {
    let prevIndex = (currentIndex - 1 + slides.length) % slides.length;
    showSlide(prevIndex);
  }

  nextBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
    nextSlide();
    resetAutoSlide();
  });

  prevBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
    prevSlide();
    resetAutoSlide();
  });

  dots.forEach(dot => {
    dot.addEventListener('click', () => {
      let index = parseInt(dot.getAttribute('data-index'));
      showSlide(index);
      resetAutoSlide();
    });
  });

  function startAutoSlide() {
    autoSlide = setInterval(nextSlide, 5000); // auto 5s
  }

  function resetAutoSlide() {
    clearInterval(autoSlide);
    startAutoSlide();
  }

  startAutoSlide();
</script>
```

```{=html}
      <!-- RIGHT PANEL -->

          <p class="post-excerpt" id="postExcerpt"></p>
          <a class="read-link" id="postLink" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Read more</a>

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    // List of posts
    let posts = [
      
      {
        title: "Advancing Medical Artificial Intelligence Using a Century of Patient Cases: Dr. CaBot and CPC-Bench",
        excerpt: `
          Harvard Medical School has just introduced the groundbreaking study “Advancing Medical Artificial Intelligence Using a Century of Cases” (Buckley et al., 2025), launching the AI system Dr. CaBot and the CPC-Bench dataset built from over 7,000 NEJM cases over 100 years.<br>
          Dr. CaBot can reason, diagnose, and present medically like a real doctor, marking the first time NEJM has published a diagnosis generated by AI.<br>
          The OpenAI o3 model achieved 84% accuracy, surpassing a group of internists and being rated as “indistinguishable from a human.”<br>
          The project opens up a new evaluation standard for medical AI, aiming for applications in training and clinical research globally.<br>
          The entire system is publicly available at https://cpcbench.com
        `,
        link: "./media/news/251014-drcabot.html",
        img: "https://cpcbench.com/assets/robot_cpc_small.png"
      },

      {
        title: "Digital Transformation of Vietnam’s Healthcare: Modernizing the National Health System for an Intelligent and Inclusive Future",
        excerpt: `
          Vietnam is strongly implementing digital transformation in healthcare to build a modern, intelligent, and efficient healthcare system.<br><br>
          <b>Key policies:</b>
          <ul>
            <li>Resolution 57-NQ/TW and the Digital Health Transformation Project 2023–2025.</li>
            <li>Development of data infrastructure, AI applications, information security, and digital human resource training.</li>
            <li>Electronic health records integrated with VNeID, a national health data system, and a Vietnamese genome project.</li>
          </ul>
          By 2030, Vietnam aims to become a regional leader in digital health.
        `,
        link: "./media/news/250919-vn-digital-health.html",
        img: "https://suckhoedoisong.qltns.mediacdn.vn/324455921873985536/2024/12/5/chuyen-doi-so-y-te-10-173338760854580749395.jpg"
      },
      
      {
        title: "Acceptance and Adoption of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in Cancer Diagnosis, Treatment, and Patient Care",
        excerpt: `
          A study by Prabal Chourasia et al. (2025) in the Journal of Patient Experience examines the acceptance of AI by cancer survivors when seeking medical information.<br>
          The results show that patients highly value AI in supporting diagnosis and information retrieval, especially with the “AI-assisted – doctor-decides” model. However, they still trust doctors more than AI, emphasizing the need for data security and transparency in information use.<br>
          AI is seen as a tool to enhance understanding and reduce the burden on doctors, but it needs to be implemented cautiously, with an appropriate legal framework and training.<br>
          In Vietnam, the BIODAS Team proposes developing “made in Vietnam” AI and piloting it at central-level hospitals before expanding.
        `,
        link: "./media/news/251010-ai-cancer.html",
        img: "https://i.pinimg.com/736x/10/fe/12/10fe12094076f89c72ee1795dcdf7cc3.jpg"
      }
    ];

    // Randomize the initial display post
    posts = posts.sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5);

    // DOM elements
    const featureImage = document.getElementById("featureImage");
    const postTitle = document.getElementById("postTitle");
    const postExcerpt = document.getElementById("postExcerpt");
    const postLink = document.getElementById("postLink");
    const thumbTrack = document.getElementById("thumbTrack");
    const prevBtn = document.getElementById("prevBtn");
    const nextBtn = document.getElementById("nextBtn");

    // Auto-generate thumbnails
    posts.forEach((p, idx) => {
      const item = document.createElement("div");
      item.className = "thumb";
      item.setAttribute("data-idx", idx);
      item.innerHTML = `<img src="${p.img}" alt="${p.title}" loading="lazy">`;
      item.addEventListener("click", () => goTo(idx));
      thumbTrack.appendChild(item);
    });

    let active = 0;
    let autoplayTimer = null;
    const DURATION = 5000; // 5s to change image

    // Render post
    function render() {
      const p = posts[active];
      featureImage.style.backgroundImage = `url('${p.img}')`;
      postTitle.textContent = p.title;
      postExcerpt.innerHTML = p.excerpt;
      postLink.href = p.link;

      // Update thumbnails
      [...thumbTrack.children].forEach((el, i) => el.classList.toggle("active", i === active));

      // Scroll thumbnails according to the post
      const thumbWidth = thumbTrack.querySelector(".thumb")?.getBoundingClientRect().width || 200;
      const gap = 14;
      const trackOffset = Math.max(0, (thumbWidth + gap) * active);
      thumbTrack.style.transform = `translateX(${-trackOffset}px)`;
    }

    // Navigation
    function goTo(i) {
      active = (i + posts.length) % posts.length;
      render();
      restartAutoplay();
    }
    function next() {
      goTo(active + 1);
    }
    function prev() {
      goTo(active - 1);
    }

    // Autoplay
    function restartAutoplay() {
      clearInterval(autoplayTimer);
      autoplayTimer = setInterval(next, DURATION);
    }

    // Button events
    prevBtn.addEventListener("click", prev);
    nextBtn.addEventListener("click", next);

    // Initialize
    render();
    restartAutoplay();
  });

</script>
```
